thread.title: Tomi Lahren Suspended by The Blaze for Pro-Choice Comments
thread.title_full: Tomi Lahren Suspended by The Blaze for Pro-Choice Comments

author: Just Jared
title: Tomi Lahren Suspended by The Blaze for Pro-Choice Comments
text:
Conservative talk show host Tomi Lahren has reportedly been suspended from appearing on her The Blaze show after she said she is pro-choice.
The 24-year-old political commentator appeared on The View last week and said that she would be a hypocrite to be pro-life when she advocates for limited government.
‚ÄúYou know what? I‚Äôm for limited government, so stay out of my guns, and you can stay out of my body as well,‚Äù she said.
After The Daily Caller reported that Tomi was suspended for the next week, she took to Twitter to joke about having free time.
So I've got some "me" time tonight. Anything good on TV? üòÇ #TeamTomi 
‚Äî Tomi Lahren (@TomiLahren) March 20, 2017
